text: This is a blog post about the new Netflix original series "Pokemon Concierge," which takes place in the world of Pokemon and follows the adventures of Harumi Doki, a concierge at a luxury resort for Pokemon and their trainers. The post includes information about the production team behind the show and provides links to download or stream the episodes with both English subtitles (生肉) and without (生肉). It also encourages readers to follow the public account "影的后花园" on WeChat for more content related to movies and TV shows.
